flavorText.text:
もりや　くさちに　おおく　せいそく。
あたまの　さきに　５センチぐらいの
ちいさく　するどい　どくばりをもつ。

どくばりは　とても　きょうりょく。
めだつ　からだの　いろは
あいてに　けいかいを　させるためだ。

とても　するどい　きゅうかくを　もっている。
こうぶつの　はっぱか　きらいな　はっぱか
おおきな　あかい　はなで　かぎわける。

とても　するどい　きゅうかくを　もっている。
こうぶつの　はっぱか　きらいな　はっぱか
おおきな　あかい　はなで　かぎわける。

あたまに　するどい　ハリを　もつ。
もりや　くさちの　しげみに　かくれ
ひたすら　ハッパを　たべている。

あたまに　するどい　ハリを　もつ。
もりや　くさちの　しげみに　かくれ
ひたすら　ハッパを　たべている。

숲이나 풀밭에 많이 서식한다.
머리끝에 5cm 정도의
작고 날카로운 독침을 지니고 있다.

독침이 매우 강력하다.
눈에 띄는 몸의 색깔은
상대방을 경계시키기 위해서다.

굉장히 예민한 후각을 지니고 있다.
좋아하는 잎사귀인지 싫어하는 잎사귀인지
크고 빨간 코로 냄새 맡아 구별한다.

굉장히 예민한 후각을 지니고 있다.
좋아하는 잎사귀인지 싫어하는 잎사귀인지
크고 빨간 코로 냄새 맡아 구별한다.

머리에 날카로운 침을 지니고 있다.
우거진 숲이나 풀밭에 숨어
끊임없이 풀잎을 먹고 있다.

머리에 날카로운 침을 지니고 있다.
우거진 숲이나 풀밭에 숨어
끊임없이 풀잎을 먹고 있다.

頭上長著尖銳的針。
總是躲在森林或是草叢裡，
不停地吃著葉子。

頭上長著尖銳的針。
總是躲在森林或是草叢裡，
不停地吃著葉子。

Il mange chaque jour son poids en
feuilles. Il utilise l’aiguillon sur sa
tête pour repousser l’ennemi.

Il mange chaque jour son poids en
feuilles. Il utilise l’aiguillon sur sa
tête pour repousser l’ennemi.

On trouve souvent ce Pokémon dans les forêts et
les hautes herbes. L’aiguillon de 5 cm sur sa tête
contient un venin très toxique.

Son aiguillon empoisonné est très dangereux.
Son corps est coloré afin de repousser ses ennemis.

L’odorat d’Aspicot est extrêmement développé. Il lui suffit de
renifler ses feuilles préférées avec son gros appendice nasal
pour les reconnaître entre mille.

L’odorat d’Aspicot est extrêmement développé. Il lui suffit de
renifler ses feuilles préférées avec son gros appendice nasal
pour les reconnaître entre mille.

L’aiguillon sur son front est très pointu.
Il se cache dans les bois et les hautes herbes,
où il se gave de feuilles.

L’aiguillon sur son front est très pointu.
Il se cache dans les bois et les hautes herbes,
où il se gave de feuilles.

Es lebt bevorzugt in Wäldern und in hohem Gras.
Auf dem Kopf trägt es einen circa 5 cm langen,
spitzen, giftigen Stachel.

Sein Giftstachel ist gefährlich. Sein hellleuchtender
Körper soll Feinde abschrecken.

Hornliu verfügt über einen ausgezeichneten Geruchssinn.
So kann es seine Lieblingsblätter von denen unterscheiden,
die es nicht mag, indem es mit seiner großen roten Nase
daran schnuppert.

Hornliu verfügt über einen ausgezeichneten Geruchssinn.
Es ist in der Lage, seine Lieblingsblätter von denen zu
unterscheiden, die es nicht mag, indem es mit seinem großen
roten Rüssel daran schnuppert.

Auf seinem Kopf befindet sich ein spitzer
Stachel. Es versteckt sich im hohen Gras
sowie in Wäldern und frisst eifrig Blätter.

Auf seinem Kopf befindet sich ein spitzer
Stachel. Es versteckt sich im hohen Gras
sowie in Wäldern und frisst eifrig Blätter.

Suele habitar bosques y praderas. Tiene un afilado y
venenoso aguijón de unos 5 cm encima de la cabeza.

Su venenoso aguijón es muy potente y su colorido
cuerpo hace que los enemigos huyan.

Weedle tiene un finísimo sentido del olfato. Es capaz de
distinguir las hojas que le gustan de las que no le gustan
olisqueando un poco con la gran nariz que tiene.

Weedle tiene un finísimo sentido del olfato. Es capaz de
distinguir las hojas que le gustan de las que no le gustan
olisqueando un poco con la gran nariz que tiene.

El aguijón de la cabeza es muy puntiagudo.
Se alimenta de hojas oculto en la espesura
de bosques y praderas.

El aguijón de la cabeza es muy puntiagudo.
Se alimenta de hojas oculto en la espesura
de bosques y praderas.

Vive soprattutto nei boschi e nei prati. Sul capo ha
un affilato e velenoso pungiglione lungo 5 cm.

Ha un pungiglione molto velenoso. La vivace
colorazione del suo corpo è un avvertimento per i
nemici.

Weedle ha un senso dell’olfatto estremamente sviluppato.
Riesce a distinguere le sue foglie preferite da quelle che
lo disgustano semplicemente annusandole con il grande
naso rosso.

Weedle ha un senso dell’olfatto estremamente sviluppato.
Riesce a distinguere le sue foglie preferite da quelle che
lo disgustano semplicemente annusandole con il grande
naso rosso.

Ha un pungiglione acuminato sul capo. Vive tra
l’erba alta e nei boschi, dove si nutre di foglie.

Ha un pungiglione acuminato sul capo. Vive tra
l’erba alta e nei boschi, dove si nutre di foglie.

Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

Beware of the
sharp stinger on
its head. It hides in grass
and bushes where
it eats leaves.

Its poison stinger
is very powerful.
Its bright-colored body is intended
to warn off its
enemies.

It attacks using a
two-inch poison
barb on its head. It can usually be
found under the
leaves it eats.

The barb on top of
its head secretes
a strong poison. It uses this toxic
barb to protect
itself.

WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense
of smell.
It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it
dislikes just by sniffing with its big
red proboscis (nose).

WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense
of smell.
It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it
dislikes just by sniffing with its big
red proboscis (nose).

A WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense
of smell. It distinguishes its favorite
kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by
sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

Often found in forests and grasslands.
It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two
inches on top of its head.

Often found in forests, eating leaves.
It has a sharp stinger on its head that
injects poison.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

Its poison stinger is very powerful.
Its bright-colored body is intended
to warn off its enemies.

It attacks using a two-inch poison
barb on its head. It can usually be
found under the leaves it eats.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

It eats its weight in leaves every
day. It fends off attackers with
the needle on its head.

Often found in forests and grasslands.
It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches
on top of its head.

Its poison stinger is very powerful.
Its bright-colored body is intended to
warn off its enemies.

Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of
distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes
just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable
of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it
dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides
in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides
in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

头上长有尖锐的针。
它喜欢藏在森林或
草丛里大量吞食树叶。

头上长有尖锐的针。
它喜欢藏在森林或
草丛里大量吞食树叶。
